member.name: M:Kwikbooks.Data.DatabaseInitializer.CheckSchemaVersionAsync(Kwikbooks.Data.KwikbooksDbContext)

member.summary: Updates the schema version in the database.

member.summary: Seeds initial data if the database is empty.

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.KwikbooksDbContext
member.summary: Main database context for Kwikbooks. Manages all entity sets and database configuration.

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Account
member.summary: Represents an account in the chart of accounts. Foundation of double-entry accounting.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Account.Balance
member.summary: Current balance of the account. Debits increase Assets/Expenses, Credits increase Liabilities/Equity/Income.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Account.IsActive
member.summary: Is this account active and available for transactions?

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Account.IsSystemAccount
member.summary: Is this a system account that cannot be deleted?

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankAccount
member.summary: Represents a bank account for tracking banking transactions.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankAccount.CurrentBalance
member.summary: Current balance as of last reconciliation or manual entry.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankAccount.OpeningBalance
member.summary: Opening balance when the account was added.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankAccount.LastReconciledBalance
member.summary: Statement ending balance from last reconciliation.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankAccount.LinkedAccountId
member.summary: Linked Chart of Accounts account (Asset account).

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankTransaction
member.summary: Bank transaction record for deposits, withdrawals, and transfers.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankTransaction.Amount
member.summary: Positive for deposits, negative for withdrawals.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankTransaction.TransferAccountId
member.summary: For transfers, the other bank account involved.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankTransaction.IsReconciled
member.summary: Whether this transaction has been reconciled.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankTransaction.ReconciledDate
member.summary: Date when the transaction was reconciled.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BankTransaction.IsCleared
member.summary: Whether this transaction was cleared by the bank.

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.BaseEntity
member.summary: Base entity class for all database models. Provides common properties like Id and audit fields.

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Company
member.summary: Represents the company/business profile. This is the primary business entity for the application.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Company.TaxYearSameAsFiscal
member.summary: Income tax year same as fiscal year

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Company.DefaultTaxRate
member.summary: Default sales tax rate (as percentage, e.g., 8.25 for 8.25%)

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Company.InventoryMethod
member.summary: Track inventory using FIFO, LIFO, or Average Cost

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Customer
member.summary: Represents a customer (someone you sell to).

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Customer.DisplayName
member.summary: How this customer appears on invoices (defaults to Name if empty)

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Customer.Balance
member.summary: Current outstanding balance (money owed by customer)

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Customer.CreditLimit
member.summary: Maximum credit allowed for this customer

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Customer.PaymentTermsDays
member.summary: Payment terms in days (used for due date calculation)

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Customer.TaxRate
member.summary: Custom tax rate for this customer (overrides default)

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Customer.DefaultIncomeAccountId
member.summary: Default income account for this customer's transactions

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.AccountType
member.summary: Types of accounts in the chart of accounts.

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.JournalEntry
member.summary: Represents a journal entry - the fundamental unit of double-entry accounting. Each journal entry must have lines that balance (debits = credits).

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.JournalEntry.Reference
member.summary: Reference to source document (invoice #, bill #, etc.)

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.JournalEntryLine
member.summary: A single line in a journal entry (either a debit or credit).

member.name: T:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Product
member.summary: Represents a product or service that can be sold or purchased.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Product.Sku
member.summary: Stock Keeping Unit - unique identifier for inventory

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Product.Type
member.summary: Product type: Inventory, Non-Inventory, or Service

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Product.IsSellable
member.summary: Is this item available for sale to customers?

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Product.IsPurchasable
member.summary: Is this item available for purchase from vendors?

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.Product.AverageCost
member.summary: Current average cost per unit (for inventory valuation)

member.summary: How often to create the journal entry.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.RecurringJournalEntry.EndDate
member.summary: Optional end date for the recurrence.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.RecurringJournalEntry.NextRunDate
member.summary: Date of the next scheduled entry.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.RecurringJournalEntry.LastRunDate
member.summary: Date of the last generated entry.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.RecurringJournalEntry.TimesGenerated
member.summary: Number of entries generated from this template.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.RecurringJournalEntry.IsActive
member.summary: Whether this recurring entry is active.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.RecurringJournalEntry.AutoPost
member.summary: Whether to automatically post generated entries.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.RecurringJournalEntry.Lines
member.summary: The template lines for this recurring entry.

member.summary: Calculates the next run date based on frequency.

member.summary: A template line for a recurring journal entry.

member.summary: Debit amount for the template line.

member.name: P:Kwikbooks.Data.Models.RecurringJournalEntryLine.CreditAmount
member.summary: Credit amount for the template line.
